channel.title: HOW TO: Use hamachi in 8 easy steps
channel.description:
okay I'm going to try to make it so you people can understand.
Step 1: Download hamachi @ http://hamachi.cc
step 2:get it all setup and stuff.
Step 3:This can go both ways. . . for a) u can make your own network. or b)u can join another so i will teach how to do b). So here is what u do goto the little triangle in the corner and go to join excisting network.
Step 4: Type the name of the network u wanna use. ex. BUT THIS NETWORK WORKS TO omgscape1 omgscape2 omgscape3 omgscape4 omgscape5 omgscape6 omgscape7 omgscape8 omgscape9 omgscape10
Step 5: For most private server people the pass to the networks is 123. Same for omgscape.
Step 6: open up moparscape client and start after loaded go to file>new server>and type the ip they provided u on the advirtisment. EX. omgscape1-10= 5.101.49.244
Step 7: go to file>new port>and type the port the add provided EX. omgscape1-10= 2007
Step 8: log in with any user or pass and have a blast.
[move]PPPPPLLLLZZZZ COMMENT[/move]

item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Wtf’s up with all the PPPP’s, LLLLL’s and ZZZZZ’s? Learn to type… And don’t advertise

i think he means PLZ with PPPPPLLLLZZZZ, and please with PLZ

topic reported to mod

item.title: HOW TO: Use hamachi in 8 easy steps
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

okay I’m going to try to make it so you people can understand.

Step 1: Download hamachi @ http://hamachi.cc

step 2:get it all setup and stuff.

Step 3:This can go both ways. . . for a) u can make your own network. or b)u can join another so i will teach how to do b). So here is what u do goto the little triangle in the corner and go to join excisting network.

Step 4: Type the name of the network u wanna use.
ex. BUT THIS NETWORK WORKS TO
omgscape1
omgscape2
omgscape3
omgscape4
omgscape5
omgscape6
omgscape7
omgscape8
omgscape9
omgscape10

Step 5: For most private server people the pass to the networks is 123. Same for omgscape.

Step 6: open up moparscape client and start after loaded go to file>new server>and type the ip they provided u on the advirtisment.
EX. omgscape1-10= 5.101.49.244

Step 7: go to file>new port>and type the port the add provided
EX. omgscape1-10= 2007

Step 8: log in with any user or pass and have a blast.

[move]PPPPPLLLLZZZZ COMMENT[/move]

Read full topic
item.source: HOW TO: Use hamachi in 8 easy steps
